title: BRIEF-IOOF Holdings Updates On Acquisition Of ANZ P&I
text:
BRIEF-IOOF Holdings Updates On Acquisition Of ANZ P&I

Stock Markets 9 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 10:35)

© Reuters. BRIEF-IOOF Holdings Updates On Acquisition Of ANZ P&I Oct 17 (Reuters) - Ioof Holdings Ltd : * UPDATE ON ACQUISITION OF ANZ P&I * WELCOMES RECEIPT OF NO OBJECTION NOTICES FROM BOTH ONEPATH CUSTODIANS PTY LIMITED (OPC) AND ANZ IN RELATION TO TRANSFER OF ANZ P&I TO IOOF * ANZ AND IOOF HAVE ALSO AGREED FOLLOWING CHANGES TO TERMS OF ANZ P&I ACQUISITION, WITH A PURCHASE PRICE OF $825 MILLION FOR ANZ P&I * APPROVAL FROM APRA REMAINS A REQUIREMENT FOR ANZ P&I TRANSACTION TO COMPLETE * UPDATE ON ACQUISITION OF ANZ P&I

BRIEF-IOOF Holdings Updates On Acquisition Of ANZ P&I
description: BRIEF-IOOF Holdings Updates On Acquisition Of ANZ P&I
